body: I think we already dropped in Netty 5.
oh good to know, what is your opinion about 4.2 ?

I'm in favour, since it's been obsolete for a while, but I want to hear what @normanmaurer has to say as well.
Relatedly, there's a couple of related issues here about dropping NPN, and also https://github.com/netty/netty-tcnative/issues/856
I am fine for 4.2 as well ... let's go
thanks for the feedback, shall I take care of it ?

issue.title: Drop support of Jetty NPN

repository.name: netty
repository.description: Netty project - an event-driven asynchronous network application framework

issue.body:
Drop support of Jetty NPN
    
Motivation:
    
The NPN feature is currently supported in Netty using the Jetty NPN library. This library has been archived and the maintainers are not keen on continuing to support it.
    
NPN has been deprecated in favour of ALPN and browsers should be using ALPN instead (ALPN is almost 10 years old), the Jetty project has dropped NPN in Jetty 9.3 (2015 - https://webtide.com/phasing-out-spdy-support/) and has not seen evidence of the lack of NPN being an issue.
    
Changes:
    
Remove dependency and handling of Jetty NPN.
    
Results:
    
Netty does not depend anymore on `org.eclipse.jetty.npn:npn-api` .
    
Fixes #14237

issue.title: Drop support of Jetty NPN

repository.name: netty
repository.description: Netty project - an event-driven asynchronous network application framework

issue.body:
Motivation:

The NPN feature is currently supported in Netty using the Jetty NPN library. This library has been archived and the maintainers are not keen on continuing to support it.

NPN has been deprecated in favour of ALPN and browsers should be using ALPN instead (ALPN is almost 10 years old), the Jetty project has dropped NPN in Jetty 9.3 (2015 - https://webtide.com/phasing-out-spdy-support/) and has not seen evidence of the lack of NPN being an issue.

Changes:

Remove dependency and handling of Jetty NPN.

Results:

Netty does not depend anymore on `org.eclipse.jetty.npn:npn-api` .

Fixes #14237
